With static site generators like Gatsby you can build and compile the ‚Äúfastest websites on the web even faster‚Äù. No calls to the database, no generating HTML, and by using a CDN to replicate your files, you can get access to your content even faster. Adittionally, there are less vulnerabilities to worry about atleast when compared to a CMS solution.

‚û° Use Cases

There are several use cases for static site generators spanning industry, technology, user role, and site type. The Gatsby website lays them out pretty well here. For my purposes, I am more interested in the integration with WordPress as well as the ability to use Markdown. I will use Markdown for my GitHub Pages portfolio site, and use the WordPress integration to revamp my WordPress Site to reap some of the benefits offered by Jamstack architecture. Read more about the Jamstack architecture at Jamstack and Netlify.
